thread.title: 6-year-old boy killed in Vanderbijlpark accident
thread.title_full: 6-year-old boy killed in Vanderbijlpark accident | News24

author: news24.com
title: 6-year-old boy killed in Vanderbijlpark accident
text:
Johannesburg - A 6-year-old boy was killed and another man seriously injured on Tuesday morning after the car in which they were travelling rolled on Vaal Drive in Vanderbijlpark, paramedics said.
ER24 spokesperson Russel Meiring said the organisation immediately responded to calls from the public. When paramedics arrived, they found a car lying on the side of the road next to a tree.
It appeared the car rolled multiple times and then crashed through a wall.
Paramedics found the six-year-old lying inside the vehicle with no signs of life. The driver was sitting outside the car in a serious condition.
